sections.heading: Poisons; sale by person not registered pharmacist prohibited; exception
sections.text: It shall be unlawful for any person, other than a duly registered pharmacist, to sell or dispense poisons as named in section 71-2501, except as otherwise provided in section 71-2501.SourceLaws 1941, c. 141, ยง 14, p. 565;C.S.Sup
